text:
Traffic crawls, endless—
Consider flying to work.
Wings might suit us best.

Tunes loop in my mind,
Time to play a hit for you.
Have you heard this one?

Sunny skies beckon,
A perfect day for golf swings.
One more round awaits.

Caps tossed in the air,
It's that time of year again.
Dreams take flight today.

Hungry, are you now?
Hot food served, steaming delight—
Let’s savor each bite.
